member.name: IPropertyValueStatics.CreateBoolean
member.summary: Creates a new object that contains the specified 8-bit Boolean value.
member.param: The value to store.
A pointer to a new object that contains value. Use the method to get the interface for the object.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The property value was created successfully.
The object could not be created.

member.name: IPropertyValueStatics.CreateBooleanArray
member.summary: Creates a new object that contains the specified array of 8-bit Boolean values.
member.param: The number of values in the array.
The array of 8-bit Boolean values to store.
A pointer to a new object that contains value. Use the method to get the interface for the object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyValueStatics.CreateEmpty
member.summary: Creates a new object that represents an empty value.
member.param: A pointer to a new object that has its property set to PropertyType_Empty. No value is stored in the new object. Use the method to get the interface for the object.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The property value was created successfully.
The object could not be created.

member.name: IPropertyValueStatics
